H0.text: In 1996, Dolly the Sheep was successfully cloned in which European country. United Kingdom

H1.text: In 1996, Dolly the Sheep was successfully cloned in which European country. France

H2.text: In 1996, Dolly the Sheep was successfully cloned in which European country. Germany

H3.text: In 1996, Dolly the Sheep was successfully cloned in which European country. H-Alba

A4.text: Dolly was cloned at the Roslin Institute, part of the University of Edinburgh, Scotland.

A5.text: The biotechnology company PPL Therapeutics, based near Edinburgh, was involved in Dolly's cloning.
